description: Manage SQL Managed Instance database backup short term retention policy.

commands.name: az sql midb short-term-retention-policy set
commands.summary: Update short term retention for automated backups on a single database.
examples: az sql midb short-term-retention-policy set -g mygroup --mi myinstance -n mymanageddb --retention-days retentionindays
az sql midb short-term-retention-policy set -g mygroup --mi myinstance -n mymanageddb --deleted-time "2018-05-20T05:34:22" --retention-days retentionindays

commands.name: az sql midb short-term-retention-policy show
commands.summary: Show short term retention for automated backups on a single database.
examples: az sql midb short-term-retention-policy show -g mygroup --mi myinstance -n mymanageddb
az sql midb short-term-retention-policy show -g mygroup --mi myinstance -n mymanageddb --deleted-time "2018-05-20T05:34:22"
